# Grandma's Cheese Cake

## Ingredients

* 0.5 Tbl butter
* 0.5 cup graham cracker crumbs
* 12 oz cream cheese
* 0.75 cups sugar
* 8 eggs
* 2 Tbl flour
* 1.5 tsp vanilla extract
* 2 cups scalded light cream

## Instructions

Grease an 8" spring form cake pan with butter. Shake the graham cracker crumbs over this so tha the bottom is covered. Freeze for 30 min to 2 hrs.

Prehead oven to 300&deg;F. Beat together the cream cheese, sugar, 4 eggs, flour, and vanilla until smooth. Turn mixer speed to lowest setting an dgradually add 2 cups scalded light cream.

Beat 4 egg whites until stiff but not dry. Add to cream cheese mixture and fold in lightly but thoroughly. Pour into the prepared cake pan, set the cake pan in a shallow tray with 1 inch of hot water and bake for about 1.5 hours. Refrigerate for at least 6 hours before serving. Grandma always garnishes with strawberries.
